Jan 20 (Reuters) - PTG Energy PCL PTG.BK:: *UNITS INVESTED IN THREESIXTY SUPPLY CHAIN COMPANY LIMITED AND ENTERED A SHARE SUBSCRIPTION DEAL & JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT *AGREEMENTS TO OPERATE SERVICE PROVIDER OF ONLINE LOGISTIC PLATFORM FOR COMMERCIAL TRANSPORT VEHICLE AND RELATED SERVICES


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 20-JAN-202200:51:59.913 GMT
